# The Core Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This modules provide an interface to libLLVMCore, which implements the LLVM intermediate representation as well as other related types and utilities. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This modules provide an interface to libLLVMCore, which implements the LLVM intermediate representation as well as other related types and utilities.

Many exotic languages can interoperate with C code but have a harder time with C++ due to name mangling. So in addition to C, this interface enables tools written in such languages.

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### LLVMAddSymbol() {#ga8706a6e4aa81193f97cf40c1dd8c0d3a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LLVMAddSymbol (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; symbolName, void &#42; symbolValue)</>}>
This functions permanently adds the symbol <code>symbolName</code> with the value <code>symbolValue</code>.

These symbols are searched before any libraries.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
sys::DynamicLibrary::AddSymbol()
</SectionUser>

### LLVMGetVersion() {#ga9110e2691c2cf5bec8bda81bb6c42ec6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LLVMGetVersion (unsigned &#42; Major, unsigned &#42; Minor, unsigned &#42; Patch)</>}>
Return the major, minor, and patch version of LLVM.

The version components are returned via the function&#39;s three output parameters or skipped if a NULL pointer was supplied.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h/#l00548">548</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.

### LLVMLoadLibraryPermanently() {#ga6fc1331c1a6d2cc6f0fda94f4a4636f9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMBool LLVMLoadLibraryPermanently (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Filename)</>}>
This function permanently loads the dynamic library at the given path.

It is safe to call this function multiple times for the same library.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
sys::DynamicLibrary::LoadLibraryPermanently()
</SectionUser>

### LLVMParseCommandLineOptions() {#ga81494b4c1a36f4eb0aae2c1225ede0e4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LLVMParseCommandLineOptions (int argc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> &#42; argv, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Overview)</>}>
This function parses the given arguments using the LLVM command line parser.

Note that the only stable thing about this function is its signature; you cannot rely on any particular set of command line arguments being interpreted the same way across LLVM versions.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a7225497318f6c1bd57e8a80d4273031e">llvm::cl::ParseCommandLineOptions()</a>
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>

### LLVMSearchForAddressOfSymbol() {#ga9361c91b1806a646e7c019ee82f927f2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void &#42; LLVMSearchForAddressOfSymbol (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; symbolName)</>}>
This function will search through all previously loaded dynamic libraries for the symbol <code>symbolName</code>.

If it is found, the address of that symbol is returned. If not, null is returned.


<SectionUser title="See Also">
sys::DynamicLibrary::SearchForAddressOfSymbol()
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/support-h/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/support-h">Support.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/dynamiclibrary-cpp/#l00247">247</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/dynamiclibrary-cpp">DynamicLibrary.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
